name: Secure Annotation Server
short_description: The Secure Annotation Server is an implementation of the W3C Annotea Protocol using Shibboleth (Internet2) based authentication and XACML (OASIS) based authorization. It's modular design enables pluggable authentication/authorization and RDF datastore.
